## SecurityQuestionsEnroll.enroll() method

Enrolls Security Questions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enroll(questionsWithAnswers: QuestionWithAnswer[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  questionsWithAnswers | <code>QuestionWithAnswer[]</code> | a colelction of user's answers to Security Questions. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

a promise to perform the enrollment or reject in case of an error.
